title: New: Three Fields – Isolator
body:
Artwork by **[Jessica Bialkowski](http://littlehenrylee.blogspot.com)**

As an individual who writes about music, I try to keep the whole affair as far from self-indulgence as possible. It’s times like this however, where I feel the need to digress into my not actually that interesting existence. Currently I’m in a diazepam induced daze, it’s 4am and despite the mass amounts of painkiller I’m on to combat the trapped tendon in my neck, I can’t fucking sleep.

So thank god for **[Three Fields](http://soundcloud.com/threefields)**, a Birmingham based ambient producer that manages to find a way of making all problems disappear through the subtlest of techniques.  The track is the first cut to drop after his recent release **_Wild Blue Yonder_.** It’s full of blissful open spaces, transporting but never directing to a specific location.

Stream the track below and check out more of his work over at his [soundcloud.](http://soundcloud.com/threefields/tracks)
